property.name: fs_gyro_ranges
property.description: max gyro readings, most to less precise (+-rad/s)

property.name: fs_gyro_resolution
property.description: resolution of reading in each full scale range (rad/s)

property.name: fs_accel_ranges
property.description: max accel readings, most to less precise (+-m/s^2)

property.name: fs_accel_resolution
property.description: resolution of reading in each full scale range (m/s^2)

property.name: fs_mag_range
property.description: +- max mag readings, most to less precise (micro T)

property.name: fs_mag_resolution
property.description: resolution of reading in each full scale range (micro T)

property.name: max_rate
property.description: maximum data publishing rate per type [gyro,accel,mag] (Hz)

property.name: min_ideal_temp
property.description: minimum temperature where the sensor's error margin is at it's lowest (C)

property.name: max_ideal_temp
property.description: maximum temperature where the sensor's error margin is at it's lowest (C)

property.name: min_gyro_error_margin
property.description: gyro variability in reading inside ideal temperature ranges, based on first full scale range (+-rad/s)

property.name: max_gyro_error_margin
property.description: gyro variability in reading outside ideal temperature ranges, based on first full scale range (+-rad/s)

property.name: min_accel_error_margin
property.description: accel variability in reading inside ideal temperature ranges, based on first full scale range (+-m/s^2)

property.name: max_accel_error_margin
property.description: accel variability in reading outside ideal temperature ranges, based on first full scale range (+-m/s^2)

property.name: min_mag_error_margin
property.description: mag variability in reading inside ideal temperature ranges, based on first full scale range (+-micro T)

property.name: max_mag_error_margin
property.description: mag variability in reading outside ideal temperature ranges, based on first full scale range (+-micro T)
